q.para: Q: Is there a parking garage nearby?

a.para: A: The closest parking garage to Top of the Rock is Rockefeller Center Garage, located at 25 W. 48th St This garage is open to the public 24/7. They can be reached at 212-698-8530.

q.para: Q: Where is the nearest MTA subway station?

a.para: A: There are several MTA stations within easy walking distance of Top of the Rock. However, the closest of all is right beneath the building. The 47-50 Streets - Rockefeller Center MTA stop is connected to the Concourse level of 30 Rockefeller Center. The B, D, F, and V trains all stop there.
